p: The proteases 2A and 3C were produced as described in [ 24]. Briefly, 2A and 3C sequences were ordered as artificial genes from Life Technologies and cloned to pBVboostFGII [ 25] expression vector. The proteins were expressed in BL21-AI (Life Technologies, Espoo, Finland) Escherichia coli ( E. coli) strain and purified using HisTrap FF crude immobilized metal affinity chromatography columns (GE Healthcare Bio-Science AB, Ume√•, Sweden) [ 24].
